document_data.caption: A map showing Brigand Way in southwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Brigand Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Brigand Way''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Brigand Way was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep. The road originated on [[Fire Way]] in the north and passed south through the quarter to end at [[Border Street]] near the [[North Force Gate]]. Along its path Brigand Way was intersected by [[Canter Street]], [[Pride Street]], [[Crypt Street]], and [[Merchant Street]].
